item.sql: SELECT * FROM (SELECT rpb_cus_number, rpb_bind_id, rpb_label_type, rpb_label_type AS rpb_label_type_name, rpb_label_id, rpb_people_type, rpb_people_type AS rpb_people_type_name, rpb_people_id, pbd_police_name AS rpb_people_name, pbd_police_id as number_id, odd_name as dept_name FROM dvc_rfid_label_people_bind r INNER JOIN plc_police_base_dtls u ON r.rpb_people_id = u.pbd_user_id INNER JOIN sys_org_dept_dtls d ON u.pbd_drptmnt_id = d.odd_id WHERE r.rpb_people_type=1 UNION ALL SELECT rpb_cus_number, rpb_bind_id, rpb_label_type, rpb_label_type AS rpb_label_type_name, rpb_label_id, rpb_people_type, rpb_people_type AS rpb_people_type_name, rpb_people_id, pbd_prsnr_name AS rpb_people_name, pbd_other_id as number_id, odd_name as dept_name FROM dvc_rfid_label_people_bind r INNER JOIN psr_prisoner_base_dtls p ON r.rpb_people_id = p.pbd_prsnr_id INNER JOIN SYS_ORG_DEPT_DTLS d ON p.pbd_prsn_area_id = d.odd_id WHERE r.rpb_people_type=2 )
item.where: WHERE rpb_cus_number = :rpb_cus_number AND rpb_label_id LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(:rpb_label_id,'%'))

item.sql: INSERT INTO dvc_rfid_label_people_bind (rpb_cus_number, rpb_bind_id, rpb_label_type, rpb_label_id, rpb_people_type, rpb_people_id) values (:rpb_cus_number, :rpb_bind_id, :rpb_label_type, :rpb_label_id, :rpb_people_type, :rpb_people_id)
UPDATE dvc_rfid_label_people_bind SET rpb_label_type = :rpb_label_type, rpb_label_id = :rpb_label_id, rpb_people_type = :rpb_people_type, rpb_people_id = :rpb_people_id

SELECT rmr_rfid_name, rmr_dept_id, rmr_dept_name, rmr_area_id, rmr_area_name, rmr_before_rfid_id, rmr_before_rfid_name, rmr_people_id, rmr_people_name, rmr_people_type, rmr_monitor_time, rmr_pos_xyz FROM (SELECT rmr_rfid_name, rmr_dept_id, rmr_dept_name, rmr_area_id, rmr_area_name, rmr_before_rfid_id, rmr_before_rfid_name, rmr_people_id, rmr_people_name, rmr_people_type, rmr_monitor_time, rmr_pos_xyz, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY rmr_people_id ORDER BY rmr_monitor_time DESC) fn FROM dvc_rfid_monitor_record WHERE rmr_monitor_flag = 1 AND rmr_cus_number = :cus AND rmr_rfid_id = :rfid) WHERE fn = 1

SELECT rmr_rfid_id AS rfid_id, rmr_record_id AS record_id, rmr_rfid_name AS rfid_name, rmr_dept_name AS dept_name, rmr_before_rfid_name AS before_rfid_name, rmr_people_type AS people_type, rmr_people_id AS people_id, rmr_people_name AS people_name, rmr_pos_xyz, TO_CHAR(rmr_monitor_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS monitor_time, pbd_other_id AS prnsr_code, pbd_sprt_mnge AS sprt_mnge, pbd_sprt_mnge AS sprt_mnge_cn, pbd_type_indc AS type_indc, pbd_type_indc AS type_indc_cn FROM (SELECT rmr_cus_number, rmr_record_id, rmr_rfid_id, rmr_rfid_name, rmr_dept_name, rmr_before_rfid_name, rmr_people_type, rmr_people_id, rmr_people_name, rmr_monitor_time, rmr_pos_xyz, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY rmr_people_id ORDER BY rmr_monitor_time DESC) fn FROM dvc_rfid_monitor_record WHERE rmr_monitor_flag = 1 AND rmr_monitor_time > TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND rmr_cus_number = ? AND (rmr_people_type = ? OR TRIM(?) IS NULL)) LEFT JOIN psr_prisoner_base_dtls ON pbd_cus_number = rmr_cus_number AND pbd_prsnr_id = rmr_people_id AND rmr_people_type = 2 INNER JOIN map_model_point_info ON mpi_cus_number = rmr_cus_number AND mpi_link_id = rmr_rfid_id AND mpi_link_type = ? AND mpi_view_id = ? WHERE fn = 1

SELECT rmr_rfid_id AS rfid_id, rmr_record_id AS record_id, rmr_rfid_name AS rfid_name, rmr_dept_name AS dept_name, rmr_before_rfid_name AS before_rfid_name, rmr_people_type AS people_type, rmr_people_id AS people_id, rmr_people_name AS people_name, rmr_pos_xyz AS pos_xyz, TO_CHAR(rmr_monitor_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS monitor_time, pbd_other_id AS prnsr_code, pbd_sprt_mnge AS sprt_mnge, pbd_sprt_mnge AS sprt_mnge_cn, pbd_type_indc AS type_indc, pbd_type_indc AS type_indc_cn FROM (SELECT rmr_cus_number, rmr_record_id, rmr_rfid_id, rmr_rfid_name, rmr_dept_name, rmr_before_rfid_name, rmr_people_type, rmr_people_id, rmr_people_name, rmr_monitor_time, rmr_pos_xyz, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY rmr_people_id ORDER BY rmr_monitor_time DESC) fn FROM dvc_rfid_monitor_record WHERE rmr_monitor_flag = 1 AND rmr_cus_number = ? AND rmr_rfid_id = ? AND rmr_people_id = ?) LEFT JOIN psr_prisoner_base_dtls ON pbd_cus_number = rmr_cus_number AND pbd_prsnr_id = rmr_people_id AND rmr_people_type = 2

item.desc: 根据人员编号和机构号查询犯人信息
item.sql: SELECT pbd_other_id AS prnsr_code, pbd_sprt_mnge AS sprt_mnge, pbd_sprt_mnge AS sprt_mnge_cn, pbd_type_indc AS type_indc, pbd_type_indc AS type_indc_cn FROM psr_prisoner_base_dtls

item.desc: 根据RFID查询联动设备（根据相同的房间编号 和 设备关联关系）
item.sql: SELECT cbd_id AS dvc_id, cbd_name AS dvc_name FROM dvc_rfid_base_dtls INNER JOIN cmr_camera_base_dtls ON cbd_cus_number = rbd_cus_number AND cbd_room_id = rbd_room_id WHERE rbd_cus_number = :cusNumber AND rbd_id = :rfidId UNION SELECT dld_dvc_id AS dvc_id, dld_dvc_name AS dvc_name FROM com_dvc_link_mian INNER JOIN com_dvc_link_dtls ON dlm_cus_number = dld_cus_number AND dlm_link_id = dld_link_id AND dld_dvc_type = :cameraType WHERE dlm_cus_number = :cusNumber AND dlm_dvc_type = :rfidType AND dlm_dvc_id = :rfidId

item.desc: 根据RFID统计房间或RFID下的人数
item.sql: SELECT rbd_cus_number AS cus_number, rbd_id AS rfid_id, rbd_name AS rfid_name, rbd_room_id AS room_id, count_people AS count, mpi_pos_x AS pos_x, mpi_pos_y AS pos_y, mpi_pos_z AS pos_z FROM dvc_rfid_base_dtls INNER JOIN (SELECT rmr_cus_number, rmr_rfid_id, COUNT(0) AS count_people FROM (SELECT rmr_cus_number, rmr_rfid_id, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY rmr_people_id ORDER BY rmr_monitor_time DESC) fn FROM dvc_rfid_monitor_record WHERE rmr_monitor_flag = 1 AND rmr_monitor_time > TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND rmr_cus_number = ? AND (rmr_people_type = ? OR TRIM(?) IS NULL)) WHERE fn = 1 GROUP BY rmr_cus_number, rmr_rfid_id) ON rmr_cus_number = rbd_cus_number AND rmr_rfid_id = rbd_id INNER JOIN map_model_point_info ON mpi_cus_number = rbd_cus_number AND mpi_link_id = rbd_id AND mpi_link_type = ? AND mpi_view_id = ? ORDER BY rbd_room_id

item.desc: 根据区域编号统计RFID监测的人员数量
item.sql: SELECT rbd_cus_number AS cus_number, SUM(count_people) AS count_people FROM dvc_rfid_base_dtls INNER JOIN (SELECT rmr_cus_number, rmr_rfid_id, COUNT(0) AS count_people FROM (SELECT rmr_cus_number, rmr_rfid_id, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY rmr_people_id ORDER BY rmr_monitor_time DESC) fn FROM dvc_rfid_monitor_record WHERE rmr_monitor_flag = 1 AND rmr_monitor_time > TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND rmr_cus_number = ?) WHERE fn = 1 GROUP BY rmr_cus_number, rmr_rfid_id) ON rmr_cus_number = rbd_cus_number AND rmr_rfid_id = rbd_id
item.where: WHERE rbd_cus_number = ? AND rbd_area_id = ? GROUP BY rbd_cus_number

item.desc: 根据日期查询罪犯某一天所经过的所有RFID基站
item.sql: SELECT rmr_rfid_id AS rfid_id, rmr_rfid_name AS rfid_name, rmr_monitor_time AS monitor_time FROM dvc_rfid_monitor_record
item.where: WHERE rmr_monitor_flag = :monitorFlag AND rmr_cus_number = :cusNumber AND rmr_people_type = :peopleType AND rmr_people_id = :peopleId AND rmr_monitor_time BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP(CONCAT(:date, ' 00:00:00'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(CONCAT(:date, ' 23:59:59'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')

item.desc: 查询监测人员的RFID点位所在的视角菜单编号用于人员搜索定位
item.sql: SELECT mpi_view_id AS view_id FROM map_model_point_info INNER JOIN dvc_rfid_base_dtls ON mpi_cus_number = rbd_cus_number AND mpi_link_id = rbd_id AND mpi_link_type = :linkType INNER JOIN (SELECT rmr_cus_number, rmr_rfid_id, rmr_people_type, rmr_people_id, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY rmr_people_id ORDER BY rmr_monitor_time DESC) fn FROM dvc_rfid_monitor_record WHERE rmr_monitor_flag = 1 AND rmr_monitor_time > TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND rmr_cus_number = :cusNumber AND rmr_people_type = :peopleType AND rmr_people_id = :peopleId) ON rbd_cus_number = rmr_cus_number AND rbd_id = rmr_rfid_id AND fn = 1 WHERE mpi_cus_number = :cusNumber
